Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to giving qualified entities a first opportunity to purchase and an opportunity to submit an offer to purchase certain residential buildings when offered for sale

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign, legislation mandating that any owner intending to sell a multi-unit residential dwelling, must first make a fairly appraised offer of sale to the tenants within the residence before making any sale offers to third parties.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mandating that any owner intending to sell a multi-unit residential dwelling, must first make a fairly appraised offer of sale to the tenants within the residence before making any sale offers to third parties.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A.9088/S.8494, in relation to creating a public benefit corporation for the construction, acquisition, and rehabilitation of permanently affordable housing.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating a public benefit corporation for the construction, acquisition, and rehabilitation of permanently affordable housing (A.9088/S.8494).
